item.title: FBI: Blast near Palm Springs fertility clinic "an intentional act of terrorism"
item.description: Palm Springs Police Chief Andy Mills reported that one person was killed in an incident that "appears to be an intentional act of violence."

item.title: 2 dead after Brooklyn Bridge hit by Mexican navy ship, Eric Adams says
item.description: Two people died and more than a dozen were hurt when a Mexican navy ship hit the Brooklyn Bridge on Saturday in New York City, officials said.

item.title: Fatal First Date
item.description: A couple’s first date ends with an ambush. Both are shot. Can the only survivor identify the shooter? "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports.

item.title: 5/17: Saturday Morning
item.description: Manhunt continues for seven inmates who broke out of a Louisiana jail, three others caught; Husband and wife duo craft Masala y Maíz, a Mexico City ho...

item.title: Missing hiker found in California mountains says she survived on wild leeks, snowmelt
item.description: A Georgia woman who went missing for weeks in California's Sierra Nevada said that she was trapped by an avalanche and survived off wild leeks and sno...
